nodes.text: Early during the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic Admiral Wurtz was in command of a fleet within the Open Circle Armada. Jedi General Mace Windu needed three of Wurtz's Star Cruisers to reinforce Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi and other Republic forces as they fought the Separatist Alliance during the Battle of Christophsis.

Considering the possibility that the kidnapping of Jabba Desilijic Tiure's son, Rotta, was part of a greater mystery, Jedi General Yoda decided to accompany the fleet. Wurtz's three Venator-class Star Destroyers arrived to Christophsis alongside four Acclamator-class assault ships to reinforced Republic forces on the ground. Jedi Master Yoda joined Admiral Wullf Yularen, who had linked up with the fleet, on the bridge of one of the Venator-class Star Destroyers and began engaging the Confederacy of Independent Systems Navy. When the blockade was in retreat, the Acclamator-class assault ships landed and deployed their forces on the planet. The flagship of Wurtz's fleet along with the four Acclamators belonged to the Open Circle's Fifth Fleet of the Republic.
Wurtz's fleet first appeared in the theatrical 2008 film, Star Wars: The Clone Wars, albeit unidentified.
